title: Ice Age - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/23/20
itunes:title: Ice Age - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/23/20
description:
George Noory and climate expert Robert Felix explore his theory and evidence that the Earth's magnetic poles may be shifting, and that this will speed up the cycle of cooling the planet's climate.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

George Noory and climate expert Robert Felix explore his theory and evidence that the Earth's magnetic poles may be shifting, and that this will speed up the cycle of cooling the planet's climate.

itunes:summary: A discussion that Earth's climate is actually cooling, not warming.
